bodyContent.text: An issue is or may be impacting customers or services.
You don't know if you should call an incident - notify other people and increase severity appropriately.

SEV-1 (Critical) : 
 Most critical issue affecting customers and users.

SEV-2 (High) : 
 Major issue affecting customers and users.

SEV-3 (Moderate) : 
 Internal issue requiring immediate action from service owners.
